statements: SELECT * FROM analytics_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, value FROM analytics_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM analytics_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, date, value FROM analytics_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value FROM analytics_data;
SELECT id, date, value FROM analytics_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM analytics_data ORDER BY date DESC, value ASC
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value, date FROM analytics_data GROUP BY date HAVING AVG(value) > 100
SELECT * FROM analytics_data WHERE value > 500 ORDER BY date LIMIT 10
SELECT id, SUM(value) AS total_value FROM analytics_data GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(value) > 1000
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount >= 1000.00 ORDER BY total_amount
SELECT * FROM LargeDataSetAnalytics;
SELECT name, age FROM LargeDataSetAnalytics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT report_name, report_timestamp FROM DataReports ORDER BY report_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM DataProcessor WHERE processor_speed > 2.5;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_data FROM DataReports LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, age, data_value FROM LargeDataSetAnalytics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM LargeDataSetAnalytics WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT report_name, report_timestamp FROM DataReports WHERE report_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_timestamp DESC;
SELECT processor_name, processor_type, processor_speed FROM DataProcessor WHERE processor_speed > 2.5 ORDER BY processor_speed ASC;
SELECT report_id, CONCAT(report_id, ' - ', report_name) AS report_info FROM DataReports WHERE LENGTH(report_data) > 100 ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM large_datasets;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_size FROM large_datasets WHERE dataset_size > 1000;
SELECT source_name FROM data_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT result_description FROM analytics_results WHERE result_id = 5;
SELECT query_text, execution_time FROM query_history WHERE execution_time < 5.00;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_size FROM large_datasets WHERE dataset_size > 1000;
SELECT source_name, data_volume FROM data_sources ORDER BY data_volume DESC;
SELECT result_description FROM analytics_results WHERE analysis_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT query_text, execution_time FROM query_history WHERE execution_time < 10.00;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_size, source_name, data_volume FROM large_datasets INNER JOIN data_sources ON large_datasets.dataset_id = data_sources.source_id;
SELECT * FROM datasets;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_size FROM datasets WHERE dataset_id = 1;
SELECT query_text FROM queries ORDER BY executed_at DESC;
SELECT result_data, result_size FROM results WHERE query_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM datasets ORDER BY dataset_id DESC;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_size FROM datasets WHERE dataset_size > 100 ORDER BY dataset_name ASC;
SELECT query_text, executed_at FROM queries WHERE query_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY query_id;
SELECT result_data FROM results WHERE result_size < 500 ORDER BY result_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
